channel.title: Robotics on University of Toronto Autonomous Drone Racing Team
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on University of Toronto Autonomous Drone Racing Team

item.title: New Autonomous FPV Drone
item.description: We built a new drone distinguished by its red features. This platform is equipped with a Jetson TX2 NX computer, a Betaflight flight control unit (FCU), and a set of infrared-reflective markers for motion capture.

item.title: Paper Submission to ICRA2024
item.description: We submit a paper about our new algorithm on time-optimal trajectory planning for autonomous drone racing.
